title: Anno: History Collection
body:
Anno: History Collection


Genres/Tags: Managerial, Strategy, Real-time
Companies: Max Design, Blue Byte, Sunflowers, Related Designs Software, Ubisoft Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 28.2 GB
Repack Size: from 5.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + many others (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Parnex)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on four ISO releases: Anno_1404_History_Edition-Razor1911 (rzr-anno1404history.iso, 3,866,034,176 bytes), Anno_1503_History_Edition-Razor1911 (rzr-anno1503history.iso, 4,068,651,008 bytes), Anno_1602_History_Edition-Razor1911 (rzr-anno1602history.iso, 748,212,224 bytes) & Anno_1701_History_Edition-Razor1911 (rzr-anno1701history.iso, 4,484,202,496 bytes)
  • Missing localizations (16 GB) added, thanks to osb79!
  • Buggy Razor1911 crack replaced with Rat431’s Uplay Emu
  • Anno_1701_History_Edition_Language_Fix-Razor1911 can be used for Anno 1701 if you stuck with broken menus
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of unneeded localizations and bonus content
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 28.2 to 5.5~12.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 6-35 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 28 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in corresponding game folders to change their language
  • If Anno 1701 shows you broken menus, copy corresponding .dll file from “_Language Enforcer” subfolder to the game root – it will force the language of your choice
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Receive four beloved city-building classics and their expansions, fully updated for modern operating systems with resolutions all the way up to 4K. Enjoy a variety of improvements in each game while continuing your existing games, thanks to full save compatibility. Includes:

1602 A.D. and its expansion New Islands, New Adventure

1503 A.D.: The New World and its expansion Treasures, Monsters & Pirates

1701 A.D. and its expansion The Sunken Dragon

1404: Dawn of Discovery® and its expansion Venice

Included Games

  • Anno 1404: History Edition (v3.00.4250/1.4513.940870)
  • Anno 1503: History Edition (v1.4520.940918)
  • Anno 1602: History Edition (v1.4509.940870)
  • Anno 1701: History Edition (v1.4512.940870)
  • Bonus Content for all four games

You can skip downloading of bonus videos and language files or you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin (Soundtracks, Wallpapers, Posters)
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-czech.bin (English localization also must be installed for Czech one to work properly)
  • fg-selective-polish.bin (English localization also must be installed for Polish one to work properly)
  • fg-selective-dutch.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-hungarian.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
